metadata.description:
ACTION! ADVENTURE! THE END OF THE WORLD! 
Al Simmons is SPAWN X!!! Teamed with the Redeemer and the robotic Omega Spawn, SPAWN X must fight the villainous forces of Mammon, Overtkill, Cy-Gor and Tiffany in order to stop them from retrieving the infamous 13 Relics of Ruin!
metadata.name: The Adventures of Spawn, Vol. 1
